```{r}
rm(list = ls())

load_pkgs <-
  function(packages = c(),
           basic.packages = c(
             "package:stats",
             "package:graphics",
             "package:grDevices",
             "package:utils",
             "package:datasets",
             "package:methods",
             "package:base"
           )) {
    package.list <-
      search()[ifelse(unlist(gregexpr("package:", search())) == 1, TRUE, FALSE)]
    package.list <- setdiff(package.list, basic.packages)
    if (length(package.list) > 0)
      for (package in package.list)
        detach(package, character.only = TRUE)
    installed_packages <- packages %in% rownames(installed.packages())
    if (any(installed_packages == FALSE)) {
      install.packages(packages[!installed_packages], dependencies = T)
    }
    invisible(lapply(packages, library, character.only = TRUE))
  }


pkg_list <- c(
  "plotly", 
  "tidyverse", 
  "readxl", 
  "GGally", 
  "psych", 
  "janitor", 
  "e1071", 
  "lubridate", 
  "fastDummies", 
  "xgboost")
load_pkgs(pkg_list)
```

```{r}
cleanData <- function(inputData) {
  tempData <- inputData %>% 
    select(!is.character) %>% 
    select(-c(id, host_since, first_review, last_review)) %>% 
    replace(is.na(.),0)
  tempData %>% return()
}

cleanData(rawData) -> noCharData 

noCharData %>% summary()

noCharData %>% describe() 
noCharScoreData %>% describe()

lm(price~., noCharData) -> model 

summary(model)

cleanData(scoringData) -> noCharScoreData

pred <- predict(model, noCharScoreData)

writeSubmit(pred)
```

```{r}
xgb_train_rmse <- NULL
xgb_test_rmse <- NULL

hyper_grid <- expand.grid(max_depth = seq(3, 6, 1), eta = seq(.2, .35, .01))  

for (j in 1:nrow(hyper_grid)) {
  set.seed(123)
  m_xgb_untuned <- xgb.cv(
    data = noCharData %>% select(-price) %>% as.matrix(),
    label = noCharData %>% select(price) %>% as.matrix(),
    nrounds = 1000,
    objective = "reg:squarederror",
    early_stopping_rounds = 5,
    nfold = 10,
    max_depth = hyper_grid$max_depth[j],
    eta = hyper_grid$eta[j]
  )
  
  xgb_train_rmse[j] <- m_xgb_untuned$evaluation_log$train_rmse_mean[m_xgb_untuned$best_iteration]
  xgb_test_rmse[j] <- m_xgb_untuned$evaluation_log$test_rmse_mean[m_xgb_untuned$best_iteration]
  
  cat(j, "\n")
}    

hyper_grid[which.min(xgb_test_rmse), ]
```
